website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for a woman's watch that is lightweight, stylish, and easy to use.
pros: A beautiful style the complements most outfits and is easy to use
Users praise this watch for being comfortable, well made, and a good value for the price
We give it top marks for its unobtrusive design
cons: The ticking of the watch is a con for some
Occasional issues with the water-resistance feature

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 6 months ago and it's still working. I have a very tiny wrist so when I read it was easy to shorten, I fell for it. Not easy to shorten at ALL! I bought a watch kit to help shorten the links and broke the tool asap. I finally was able to shorten 1 side and now I clasp it further to 1 end rather than trying to shorten the other side. BUT, it was worth the work cause you can't get much cheaper than the cost of this watch.
customer_reviews.author: GayeLynn

customer_reviews.title: Great simple silver watch
customer_reviews.text: I needed a silver watch that could be dressy enough for a wedding, but I didn't want to spend a fortune. This watch was perfect. I love the size of the watch face, easy to read. The design is very simple, but elegant. I did have to resize myself, it wasn't the easiest due to small size of the links, but was able to do it with some concentration. And if you didn't want to do it yourself you could always take it to a jeweler who has all the special tools
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised and what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: My watch arrived just as promised, working and looking just as I hoped. Makes me crazy not to have a watch on my wrist so I was very happy to take it out of the box, remove the pin block, set the time and all was good.
customer_reviews.author: Anita McConnell

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely attractive, not cheap-looking at all! I had to have a battery put in, but I am very happy with the purchase. And what a GREAT price!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie H.

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: I got this beautiful watch as an early gift for my mom for Mother's Day. She loved it! It ran a little large for my hand, but it worked out well for my mom. I noticed that some of the reviews mentioned that the battery was running when they first got theirs, but that was not the case for ours. It wasn't until she was ready to wear it that she started the battery. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this watch. It's very lightweight, but I wanted something to wear with my silver jewelry and this fits the bill. It is large on my wrist, but I kind of like the "bracelet" look! Don't know if I'll take out links or not. The watch arrived in a timely manner and was packed nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous way to tell time
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn a watch in years, but when I saw this one on sale, I wanted it. And now I haven't taken it off. I wasn't going to purchase it, having read some of the reviews that say it's cheap and stops working quickly. But I'm glad I did, because it's still ticking a month, on. Maybe those customers just got the odd defective ticker.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Numero Uno

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, dainty watch
customer_reviews.text: I received the Quartz Silver Wrist Watch. It is a beautiful little watch and very dainty. I would have liked for it to have an extender, but I can wear it as is and I will. It arrived promptly and was packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Love, love this nicely made watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It is beautiful and goes well with whatever I am wearing. I definitely will recommend this watch to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ter

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for a great price w/ great service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I had a slight problem with the clasp being loose. Requested a new clasp and was PROMPTLY sent an email promising a full new watch. I said I only needed the claps and (in fairness) I bent my into place with pliers in the meantime, and they said "no problem, it's already mailed, make it a gift. Above and beyond expectations!!! The watch arrived on time in a nice box. Old review: Looks good, especially for the price. Just a simple, but not boring, watch. Band is quite long, but it was relatively easy to figure out how to size it on YouTube, plus I think a little looser band is more fitting with the "bracelet" theme.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch
customer_reviews.text: I am really in love this watch! It is small very simple, nothing too flashy or over the top but it gives the perfect look and touch to everything exactly what I was looking for! It's also at an amazing price for such a beautiful watch! I wear it everywhere, everyday and I am stunned at the compliments I get from my friends or even strangers! It's simply a beautiful, comfortable watch to wear and on top of that it's water resistant! Thanks for the great product!
customer_reviews.author: Steph_mon

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. I usually wear yellow gold jewelry but sometimes I wear white gold or silver colored jewelry. This watch was very inexpensive but it looks like I paid a lot for it. It is large and I had to take it to a jewelers to have some links removed so it would fit my wrist. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Van Dalsen

customer_reviews.title: Elegant watch to keep always.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and elegant watch. I was surprised and thankfull for ordering this watch. I hope I will cherish this for a long time to come. This watch has a sophisticated look and that's why I chose it plus it fits as a small watch on your wrist. Love it! I just received my watch and will wear it on my special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee Blake

customer_reviews.title: WOW !!  Beautiful watch !!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful watch ! Very simple, very elegant. I bought it for a gift but will keep it for myself after trying it on.
customer_reviews.author: L J S

customer_reviews.title: The best one i have ever seen with good quality and ...
customer_reviews.text: The best one i have ever seen with good quality and feasible price. Recommended to my friends and even they liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit Shankar

customer_reviews.title: Prettier in person!
customer_reviews.text: The picture does,not do this watch justice. So much nicer in person. Ordered this so I could wear to work, so pretty, I ordered a 2nd one. That way if I ruin the one for work, I have another.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Love my new watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new watch!!! It looks so delicate but is working well. My kids got me two "Mom" charms and I added them on to the watch. Now I have a charm watch. Can't beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: txpauline

customer_reviews.title: clasp missing
customer_reviews.text: i had bought this for vacation and when the trip was delayed i put it on a shelf. unfortunately when i was ready to use it like 6 months later i opened the box to discover the clasp has a piece missing you cannot actually clasp the watch on your wrist. it's very nice looking and still works, but it totally unusable and i cannot seem to contact the seller directly and of course the return window is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy U

customer_reviews.title: Discolored after a couple of months of daily wear
customer_reviews.text: I had to take a few links out to make it fit my small wrist. That was easy to handle and expected. I did not realize that it was only the back of the clock face that was stainless steel. After a few months of wearing the watch everyday it is no longer silver but more of a rose gold / bronze color. The watch works fine still, it is just not a nice silver I purchased originally.
customer_reviews.author: averageconsumer

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: i really loved how pretty this watch is. unfortunately, that's where the love ended! i've had it less than a month and it is totally discolored. worse, though, is that it loses too much time too fast. this morning i checked the time at 9:30 and the watch read 9:25; i adjusted it. at 11:40, the watch read 10:35!! seriously? i didn't expect much for $15, but i expected more than a month. save your money; you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t think I had to check
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t think I had to check I purchased this as a gift. When the person receiving the gift took out the watch to put it on, she thought it was lovely. Unfortunately, when she tried to fasten it the fastener was almost unbudgeable. She was sure she could get it to open by some means. When I see her next I will ask her how that turned out. As the giver, I felt bad about this. It’s something I never even thought would be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Suze S.

customer_reviews.title: Once wet, not functional
customer_reviews.text: Got this watch wet just a bit and the glass held onto the water for a couple of weeks. Returned it and had the same experience again! It is a nice watch, light and nice looking, but I am pretty careful with my watches and this one got wet and cloudy at the slightest provocation and would not dry.
customer_reviews.author: rkdoulou

customer_reviews.title: Links are NOT removable!
customer_reviews.text: This product’s Page states that the links are removable. I couldn’t get them out, so, as recommended by the product manufacturer, I took the watch to a jeweler... who informed me that the pins were sodered
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Watch quit working at 3 weeks after I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ETEVON Women’s Quartz Silver Wrist Watch with Small Crystal Dial and Hollow Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch ! It is light weight and feels good on my wrist. The face is big enough that I do not have to struggle with my "old eyes" to see the time.
customer_reviews.author: LetLucy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The watch kept falling off because the clasp would not stay closed. After two months of this, the stem fell out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: REALLY small
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in nice packaging, undamaged, as ordered, but fits VERY small. My wife usually has to remove links (or have a jeweler remove links) from watches like this, and this watch was tight right out of the box, and has no extra links to put in. Disappointedly returning.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Kirk

customer_reviews.title: not waterproof like it was supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: The watch stopped being waterproof after 3 times in the water. I had it fixed but now it is just a watch, not waterproof like it was supposed to be. The watch repairman said that the water seal wasn't an;y good.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Moisture accumulated under the crystal 3 days after purchase. Stopped working!
customer_reviews.author: PatMc

customer_reviews.title: Clasp stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The watch was great for about 2 months. Then the watch kept falling off of my wrist. Upon taking a closer look, I realized that the upper portion of the clasp was now too big or loose and didn't actually "click" onto the bottom portion. I will be looking for a new watch.
customer_reviews.author: gnef

customer_reviews.title: Clasp doesn't stay well
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch, easy enough to remove links, but the clasp doesn't stay closed very much. My wife has pretty much given up on wearing the watch because it comes off almost every day from just normal activities.
customer_reviews.author: mittim13

customer_reviews.title: RETURNED I couldn’t wear it.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly disappointed in this watch. It is pretty but the clasp opening had metal residue from the mold and the clasp wouldn’t even fit in. There was no way to close it. I would do less stars but I am required to do one.
customer_reviews.author: Angela T. Dula

customer_reviews.title: Fix clasp please.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this watch looked nice and elegant..and it did buuut..the clasp hook would not go thru the hole and when I tried to push it thru lightly it broke. What a disappointment. I guess I got a cheap watch that I can't wear.
customer_reviews.author: Baena GI

customer_reviews.title: I loved the watch
customer_reviews.text: I loved the watch! Being petite, the bracelet fit me perfectly and so pretty. The issue is the battery stopped working in less than a week so I have to decide whether to get a refund, or take another chance and see if a replacement won't have the same issue. Before deciding I will check on the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Middletowner

customer_reviews.title: Bad watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch fell off my wife's arm after 3 days. The pin that connects the band to the watch fell out. I was fortunate to find the pin but it is held in place now with clear finger nail polish.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Parrish

customer_reviews.title: it's beautiful ". I felt the same way when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch for my daughter's 13th birthday. When she opened the package in front of all her friends, they gasp. The look on her face made the day. One friend said "oh my God, it's beautiful ". I felt the same way when I was making the order. However, the watch is much more beautiful in person. I did make a mistake and told her it was waterproof. When she damaged it by water, I immediately had to order a replacement because she loved it so much. Thanks for the best birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kwana Murray

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous!! Exactly what I was looking for!! Clasp is easy!! Best product for the great price! And I bought other watches from Amazon with cloth band that tore within 6 months. Don't look any further!!
customer_reviews.author: cubscout mother

customer_reviews.title: Delicate and Professional
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch. It is delicate and professional-looking, without being too noticeable. I am a law student and I was looking for a watch which would be nice, classy, and inexpensive. That is exactly what I got with this. Further, I appreciated the fact that the watch face is so small.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a great choice. Just about as good and nice looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it while my other watch was in the shop, It was a great choice. Just about as good and nice looking as my expensive watch.
customer_reviews.author: Robin D. Teagarden Jr.

customer_reviews.title: No instructions to take links off
customer_reviews.text: I received my watch and it had no instructions. I had no idea how to take links out of it. I took it to a jeweler and paid $10.00 for them to do so. I wore the watch one day and the battery died. Now I had to buy a new battery which was hard to find. I'm not satisfied with this item at all. It's very cheaply made. I'm one unhappy customer. I won't return it because it would cost me more money. I spent enough money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Miller

customer_reviews.title: You shouldn't have to worry about getting a bad battery. The watch comes in an attractive box ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an elegant little watch that you can wear with a casual or formal outfit. The battery is protected with an insert, so it will not start ticking until you receive it. You shouldn't have to worry about getting a bad battery. The watch comes in an attractive box so it would make a good gift. It also comes with a one year warranty for any manufacturing problems. It's a good watch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, my wife has a small wrist
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch, my wife has a small wrist, so we have to get two links taken out to fit her wrist. Nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Spence

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep time
customer_reviews.text: While it's a pretty watch, after just 4 days of use it stops periodically and then somehow speeds up and is 15 minutes ahead. It also didn't come with any of the warranty information I had expected per the item's description when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful watch for a small wrist
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is lead and nickel free. It is a cute dainty watch and took little practice to open and close the tiny clasp. I will definitely wear it. My wrist is very small therefore my husband took out 4 links. If I buy another watch I would try a little wider and heavier band. I need to revise my review. After one week this watch stopped working. I still gave it two stars because the watch and band are nickel free and did not give me any allergy. I hate to go through the return process now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The length of the watch band is perfect for me. It looks lady-like but the dial is still easy for me to read without my cheater glasses on.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch because I thought it was pretty and I have not had a watch in a couple years. However, I cannot get it to clasp shut. I even had other people try to do it. Guess I shall just have to carry it in my purse.😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: czchica

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and useless
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t even give this 1 star. First it says it comes with directions for use which there were none. Second I put it on and not even 2 hours later the band broke right at the watch part spring blew out and was lost by the time I picked it up off the floor. Big waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Jillnelson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully Made
customer_reviews.text: This watch was exactly as pictured i have a function to attended and needed a cute silver watch and it's awesome looks very fancy not cheap...cant wait to wear it....
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth that price.
customer_reviews.text: This broke the instant I received it. I set the watch, went to put it on my wrist and the clasp broke when I opened it. Very poor quality. Will not order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Becerra

customer_reviews.title: Thank You for Beauty Plus
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight and works great. I am so glad that I was able to find a watch that I could see the dial and also is a great looking watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice watch but it doesn't last long. It will tarnish within a couple of weeks. It looks nice at first. I ended up throwing it away 🤷🏾‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to fasten and unfasten
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but I just cannot faster and unfasten this watch! It’s really a struggle. I plan to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jill S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 7" wrist
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this watch. Perfect size for my 7" wrist. The only trouble is I'm on my 3rd one. The battery died after only 2 months on the first. The bracelet detached from the watch on the second. So far so good on the third.
customer_reviews.author: m nichols

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Bought it for my Mum and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Oyobo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I did not like this watch, my husband had a time taking out links for my thinner wrists. Now it looks fantastic, seems to take good time, well worth the inexpensive price!
customer_reviews.author: Lauralyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great for the price. I love it! Very elegant, yet functional for a new Mom who always has her hands in water!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: My watch arrived promptly
customer_reviews.text: My old watch had died when I was in the hospital, and it was nice to have a working watch on my wrist!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gammill

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my new favorite watch. Its elegant and nice to go on any occasion. I love that the bands are made just right for a female. Its just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette J

customer_reviews.title: EH!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the watch and it came quickly, but on the 11th day of wearing, the link that attaches the pretty bracelet to the watch broke off. Sooo, not so good. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MEMERE 6

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: The watch was too large. Most watches have a clasp you can remove this watch did not and the watch just 'rolled' around my wrist. It was cheap but it still wasn't worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for the price. Lightweight, easy to resize by removing links (though you do need to get a watch kit to do so). Very simple but lovely style. After about 8 months, one of the rhinestones inside fell off and stuck to the watch face glass. It's possible that was because I wore it into the shower a few times. Battery ran out after about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks just like the picture and is of good quality - you get a good product for an inexpensive price. I have a large wrist so it is snug and I prefer a loose fitting watch. Going to use this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: DPJ

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WATCH ETEVON, Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked watch faces that are not so large. This watch is the perfect size and very feminine. I would recommend this little, very affordable watch to anyone that asks. Like it says at the beginning of the review "I love it"!
customer_reviews.author: Maizy

customer_reviews.title: If it is a good or a bad product
customer_reviews.text: Turned black after 3 weeks and did not shower or bath with it on
customer_reviews.author: teresa metz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed !!
customer_reviews.text: Although it is a pretty watch, I am afraid that I was extremely disappointed on attempting to snap it it on, which was very difficult to do so, after trying a number of times, the snap would not close. This was the Etevon watch.
customer_reviews.author: Citizens Bank

customer_reviews.title: This watch is junk.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst watch I have ever purchased. I didn't wear it right away and after I opened the package and wore it twice, it stopped working. Now it is too late to return and I am out $12.99 for purchasing this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch that was easy to adjust for my extra small wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Tamy

customer_reviews.title: The clasp was to big to fit in the end so it will not clasp.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty watch but I gave it 2 stars because I cannot wear it, the clasp end will not close. I think it is a manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: this makes it the perfect watch to pair with bangles or other bracelets
customer_reviews.text: Cute watch. It's fairly small and the chain is longer than most watch bands. However, this makes it the perfect watch to pair with bangles or other bracelets.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice watch I really like it a whole lot
customer_reviews.text: I had to remove two links on the band but other than that it is a very nice watch. It is pretty waterproof floor running water I accidentally had it on in the shower in the Crystal did not fogg up and it still kept time I thought that was pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch and Quick Service
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch very much because it is delicate looking. It has a slightly loose fit on my wrist and feels like a bracelet. Nice design and I like the silver!
customer_reviews.author: suet

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The looks and design of the watch are so versatile...can be worn anywhere and be in style. For the price, it is an excellent purchase! I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this watch and it does look great. Simply elegant and should be perfect for work and everyday use, especially for the low price. The clasp is a little hard to maneuver but once you figure it out, then it's easy enough. Didn't need to change the length and I think I have an average sized wrist.
customer_reviews.author: CLW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for day or night.
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. I can wear it for causal or dressy. It's everything it said it would be and more. Just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper 10

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not as promised; after four wears, it broke!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of it, how soft and light it feels, how elegant it looks. I loved my watch! I bought it to use it for my daughter's wedding on November 3rd. Used it then for the first time. Used it every Sunday after that until this past Sunday before Thanksgiving when it broke! I am so sad and disappointed! It is hard for me to find a watch that I really like. I checked the return policy and I missed it by a week! So sad!!!
customer_reviews.author: claudia v.

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: A very elegant and delicate watch. Perfect for a formal occasion as well as not so formal. Doesn't overwhelm the wrist. Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Harrinanan

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty watch.  But....
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this watch. Very nice looking watch. Kept perfect time. And got lots of compliments on it. However, the clasp was not a tight fit and it fell off my arm and was lost within 2 weeks of receiving it. Most likely just one bad clasp. But not sure I will replace it with another
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE GREENE

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I mean it looks just like the picture and I got it on time BUT I literally wore it once and it broke right where those hoops attach. The item is very fragile and needs to be reinforced. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but arrived with a dead battery. I bought it to wear to a special event. Packed it to take, put it on. Dead.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely watch. Looks expensive,but very affordable. Shipping is fast, too.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof (I shower with it), durable, delicate. ...
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof (I shower with it), durable, delicate. I got a watch link remover to resize it, the wrist size was too small for me.
customer_reviews.author: marly

customer_reviews.title: Soooo disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am soooo disappointed the watch broke after just one wear :( ... I guess you get what you pay for. Its a beautiful watch though.
customer_reviews.author: petrina brown

customer_reviews.title: silver watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, but I have only had it a few months and it already stopped working. I am not happy. Return window was closed so now I am stuck with a watch that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa DeLisle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Watch
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase. Delivery was prompt and the watch is exactly as described. It is a great every day watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T.

customer_reviews.title: Good watchr
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch, links able to be removed so it fits my very small wrist, well- packaged, arrived on time in good condition, reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Edy Nicolini

customer_reviews.title: Cute and dainty
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty watch. It is quite small and dainty though. The face is about the size of a dime. I have worn it a few times, but need to have a few links taken out of each side. It is nice for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: AmyJM333

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It was a cute light watch that would have been perfect however a pin came out on second wear, I decide to return and get a different one. However I could have easily gotten a replacement if I had wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful watch, I had to remove some links for it to fit me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a very good buy for the money. Keeps it’s shine and very durable. Love it! Strong clasp also.
customer_reviews.author: minnie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty watchb
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful looking and again it’s too soon to review this. As after a week or two
customer_reviews.author: Glen Whittemore

customer_reviews.title: I GUESS FOR THE PRICE IT'S SOME WHAT GOOD, I'M BEING KIND TO GIVE IT A 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: WAY SMALLER THAN EXPECTED, I GUESS FOR THE PRICE IT'S SOME WHAT GOOD, I'M BEING KIND TO GIVE IT A 4 STAR, JUST NOT WHAT I EXPECTED
customer_reviews.author: C. SIMMS

customer_reviews.title: Fine for price
customer_reviews.text: Crystals not as big as perceived in picture. Ok for price. add a bracy and looked quite good with dressy.
customer_reviews.author: Aleise

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: The box it came in made it look like a fancy jewelry store item. Very nice watch for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: PCostanzo

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it is light weight I hope it last. I love the simple style exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Nice timepiece and great value
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Very pretty yet feels like a solid item. The band is the perfect length for my wrist. And the price was certainly right 😊
customer_reviews.author: Christine Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Isn't cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This is such a pretty, feminine watch. I wanted a watch that didn't have the huge face and this was just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: sandra huttner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear, I have arthritis in my wrist, but can wear this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mary J. Roddy

customer_reviews.title: Eve on quartz silver wrist watch
customer_reviews.text: I just love the watch. Use for casual and dress up.
customer_reviews.author: Amalia Iadone

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This watch is better quality than I anticipated due to the low price. It is delicate and pretty, yet seems sturdy. I like to wear a wrist full of bracelets, but need a watch on for work. The watch blends in great with my bracelets and looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Dead Ken

customer_reviews.title: cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: The watch arrived with half of band unattached. We found a small pin in the box but it does not keep the band in place. The latch is very hard to open and close. I would not buy again. I doubt I can ever wear it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Easterling

feature_bullets: ❤CASUAL SIMPLE DESIGN❤ The watch features with small silver-toned case with simple crystal markers and droplets hollow bracelet. Perfect for all kind of business, casual, indoor activities and daily use
❤IDEAL GIFTS FOR WOMEN❤ Comes in an elaborate luxury gift box. No extra wrapping needed. Perfect fashion gift to your girlfriend and wife, etc.
❤WATER RESISTANT FOR DAILY USE❤ In general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming
❤HIGH QUALITY COMPONENTS❤ Unique round crystal dial and scratch resistant mineral glass window
